mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu ( MENU_ID_,SYS_ID_,NAME_,KEY_,FORM_,ENTITY_NAME_,ICON_CLS_,IMG_,PARENT_ID_, DEPTH_,PATH_,SN_,URL_,SHOW_TYPE_,IS_BTN_MENU_,CHILDS_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_BY_, CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,BO_LIST_ID_,MOBILE_ICON_CLS_,principalId, principal,gjyhId,gjyh, gnStatus, onlineTime,DESCP_,developUser ) VALUES ( #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{form,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depth,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isBtnMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{childs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{boListId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileIconCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{principalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gjyhId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gjyh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gnStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{onlineTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{descp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{developUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET SYS_ID_=#{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME_=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEY_=#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORM_=#{form,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTITY_NAME_=#{entityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICON_CLS_=#{iconCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMG_=#{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID_=#{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPTH_=#{depth,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PATH_=#{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SN_=#{sn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, URL_=#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOW_TYPE_=#{showType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_BTN_MENU_=#{isBtnMenu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDS_=#{childs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY_=#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME_=#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY_=#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME_=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BO_LIST_ID_=#{boListId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_ICON_CLS_=#{mobileIconCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principalId=#{principalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principal=#{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gjyhId=#{gjyhId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gjyh=#{gjyh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gnStatus=#{gnStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, onlineTime=#{onlineTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCP_=#{descp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, developUser=#{developUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE MENU_ID_=#{menuId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SYS_MENU where MENU_ID_=#{menuId}
SELECT sm.* FROM SYS_MENU sm RIGHT JOIN OS_GROUP_MENU gm on sm.MENU_ID_=gm.MENU_ID_ WHERE sm.SYS_ID_=#{sysId} and gm.GROUP_ID_=#{groupId} AND sm.IS_BTN_MENU_='NO' ORDER BY sm.SN_ ASC

SELECT distinct sm.* FROM SYS_MENU sm , OS_GROUP_MENU gm,OS_REL_INST rel where sm.MENU_ID_=gm.MENU_ID_ and sm.SYS_ID_=#{sysId} and gm.GROUP_ID_=rel.PARTY1_ and rel.REL_TYPE_KEY_='GROUP-USER-BELONG' and rel.PARTY2_=#{userId} and rel.TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId} AND sm.IS_BTN_MENU_=#{isBtnMenu} ORDER BY sm.SN_ ASC
select o.group_id_,og.KEY_,m.menu_id_,m.url_ from sys_menu m left join os_group_menu o on m.MENU_ID_=o.MENU_ID_ left join os_group og on og.GROUP_ID_=o.GROUP_ID_ where o.group_id_ is not null ;
SELECT g.KEY_ FROM SYS_MENU sm , OS_GROUP_MENU gm,os_group g WHERE sm.MENU_ID_=gm.MENU_ID_ and gm.GROUP_ID_=g.GROUP_ID_ and sm.KEY_=#{key}
select * from SYS_MENU sm where sm.SYS_ID_=#{sysId} order by sm.SN_ asc

SELECT distinct sys_menu.* FROM os_group_menu LEFT JOIN os_rel_inst ON os_group_menu.GROUP_ID_ = os_rel_inst.PARTY1_ LEFT JOIN sys_menu ON os_group_menu.MENU_ID_ = sys_menu.MENU_ID_ where os_rel_inst.PARTY2_ =#{userId} and os_group_menu.MENU_ID_ =#{menuId}

select m.MENU_ID_,m.PARENT_ID_ ,m.NAME_,m.BO_LIST_ID_,boList.KEY_,m.MOBILE_ICON_CLS_ from sys_menu m, os_group_menu om,SYS_BO_LIST boList, os_rel_inst i where m.MENU_ID_=om.MENU_ID_ and om.GROUP_ID_= i.PARTY1_ and m.BO_LIST_ID_ is not null and m.BO_LIST_ID_=boList.ID_ and i.PARTY2_=#{userId} and i.TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId} GROUP BY m.MENU_ID_,m.PARENT_ID_ ,m.NAME_,m.BO_LIST_ID_,boList.KEY_,m.MOBILE_ICON_CLS_

select count(*) from sys_menu where BO_LIST_ID_=#{boListId}
and MENU_ID_!=#{menuId}
SELECT sm.* FROM SYS_MENU sm RIGHT JOIN SYS_INST_TYPE_MENU gm on sm.MENU_ID_=gm.MENU_ID_ WHERE sm.IS_BTN_MENU_='NO' AND gm.INST_TYPE_ID_=#{typeId} ORDER BY sm.SN_ ASC
SELECT sm.* FROM SYS_MENU sm LEFT JOIN SYS_INST_TYPE_MENU gm on sm.MENU_ID_=gm.MENU_ID_ WHERE gm.SYS_ID_=#{sysId} AND gm.INST_TYPE_ID_=#{instTypeId} ORDER BY sm.SN_ ASC

select sys_menu.* from sys_menu where PARENT_ID_ = #{parentId} and MENU_ID_ in ( SELECT sys_menu.MENU_ID_ FROM os_user LEFT JOIN sys_inst ON os_user.TENANT_ID_ = sys_inst.INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN sys_inst_type ON sys_inst.INST_TYPE_ = sys_inst_type.TYPE_CODE_ LEFT JOIN sys_inst_type_menu ON sys_inst_type.TYPE_ID_ = sys_inst_type_menu.INST_TYPE_ID_ LEFT JOIN sys_menu ON sys_inst_type_menu.MENU_ID_ = sys_menu.MENU_ID_ WHERE USER_ID_ =#{userId} AND sys_menu.IS_BTN_MENU_ =#{isBtnMenu})

SELECT sys_menu.* FROM sys_inst_type_menu sm LEFT JOIN sys_inst_type ON sm.inst_type_id_ = sys_inst_type.TYPE_ID_ LEFT JOIN sys_menu ON sm.MENU_ID_ = sys_menu.MENU_ID_ WHERE sm.sys_id_ = #{sysId} AND sys_inst_type.TYPE_CODE_ =#{instType}

select count(*) from sys_menu where KEY_=#{key}
and MENU_ID_!=#{menuId}
select count(*) from sys_menu m where m.PARENT_ID_=#{parentId} and m.SYS_ID_=#{sysId}
SELECT * FROM SYS_MENU where SYS_ID_=#{sysId} and IS_BTN_MENU_=#{isBtnMenu} order by SN_ asc
select * from sys_menu m where m.PARENT_ID_=#{parentId} and m.SYS_ID_=#{sysId} order by SN_ asc
select * from sys_menu m where m.PARENT_ID_=#{parentId} order by SN_ asc
select * from sys_menu m where m.PARENT_ID_=#{parentId} and IS_BTN_MENU_=#{isBtnMenu} order by SN_ asc
select * from sys_menu m where m.PARENT_ID_=#{parentId} and KEY_=#{key}
mapper.delete: delete from sys_menu where PATH_ like #{path}
select count(*) from sys_menu where PARENT_ID_=#{parentId}
mapper.select: select * from sys_menu m where PATH_ like #{path}
select * from sys_menu m where KEY_=#{key}
